front.title: IEEE Draft Trial-Use Standard for Automatic Test Markup Language (ATML) for Exchanging Automatic Test Equipment and Test Information Via XML: Exchanging Instrument Descriptions

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This document specifies an exchange format, utilizing XML, for identifying instrumentation which may be integrated in an automatic test system (ATS) that is to be used to test and diagnose a unit under test (UUT).
